Pow! Hand Extension (EX Team Rocket Returns 85)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
Trainer Rocket's Secret Machine
Pow! Hand Extension
逆転! マジックハンド Turnaround! Magic Hand

Illus. Katsura Tabata
English expansion EX Team Rocket Returns
Rarity
English card no. 85/109
Japanese expansion Rocket Gang Strikes Back
Japanese Rarity
Japanese card no. 073/085

Pow! Hand Extension (Japanese: 逆転! マジックハンド Turnaround! Magic Hand) is a Rocket's Secret Machine card. It is part of the EX Team Rocket Returns expansion.

Contents

  • 1 Card text
  • 2 In the manga
    • 2.1 Pokémon Adventures
      • 2.1.1 FireRed & LeafGreen arc
  • 3 Trivia
    • 3.1 Origin
  • 4 In other languages

Card text

All prints
You can't have more than 1 ACE SPEC card in your deck.
You can't have more than 1 ACE SPEC card in your deck.
Team Plasma
Team Plasma
You can't have more than 1 ACE SPEC card in your deck.
FLARE
(Prism Star) Rule
You can't have more than 1 card with the same name in your deck. If a card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
TAG TEAM
display:none;
display:none;
display:none;
display:none;
display:none;
{{{ruletext}}}
VSTAR Power
You may use this card only if you have more Prize cards left than your opponent.

Move 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon. Or, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch.

Do Nothing  
At the beginning of your turn, flip a coin. If heads, you can do nothing during your turn. If tails, your opponent can do nothing during his or her next turn.
Do Nothing
 
At the beginning of your turn, flip a coin. If heads, you can do nothing during your turn. If tails, your opponent can do nothing during his or her next turn.
Do Nothing  
At the beginning of your turn, flip a coin. If heads, you can do nothing during your turn. If tails, your opponent can do nothing during his or her next turn.


In the manga

Pokémon Adventures

FireRed & LeafGreen arc

The machine on this card was used in A Beastly Cold Reception by Carr. It was used to grab Red, Blue, Lorelei, and their Pokémon.
